_sText:
Hey guys !

Today i give you my new map
ba_jail_invasion

-----SCENARIO-----
You arrived in a spaceship, you have acces to the moon with a teleporter and there is a lot of activities for spend time.

-----Activities-----
-Pool with : Jump in the water block / jump in the target

-Disco with 4 song

-Playground in the moon with : Little climb / dodge 

-Simon says

-the "BÃ©ret" : It"s a game 6 vs 6, 1 jail for 1 Ts, the CTs choose 1 number ans the first T who press the button teleport his enemy.

-Robot Room

-----To be continue-----

This version is the first stage of the end of this map, in some month, new mod will appear name ba_jailrp. In my map they'll be a lot of Random Event like Alien ATTACK, but later ^^

-----UPDATE-----
v1, 
- They were Texture bug in the main room, i correct it

- More optimisation (don't see Pool in the Disco now)

- +1 Vent, and 1 Teleporter in the jail

- More detail

- Teleporter in the corner of the main room is better (you can leave this)

v1_1
- Adding UFO in the space

- Fixing the secret behind the jail (teleporter)

- Changing the "main" white texture and metal door for reflexion error.

- Changing a lot of props (win 20 MO !)

- Changing Climb in space

- Fixing 1 trigger_push in the disco

- Fixing Skybox

Have fun !

Raphi
